headline: Brown & Brown, Inc. acquires the assets of J. Kevin Campbell Agency
summary: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla., Dec. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- J. Scott Penny, chief acquisitions officer of Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO), and Kevin Campbell, principal of the J. Kevin Campbell Agency, Inc. (“Campbell Agency”), today announced that a subsidiary of Brown & Brown, Inc. has acquired the assets of the Campbell Agency. The Campbell Agency was founded in 1991 by Kevin Campbell, with a focus on delivering best-in-class workers’ compensation insurance solutions for its customers. Kian Ostovar
